summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the condemnation proceedings to acquire certain property and property rights necessary for storm drain purposes for the Lake Washington - Southeast Sewer Improvement Project in Brighton Beach Acre Tracts, Hillman City Addition and Hillman City, Division No. 2, for storm sewer purposes under Ordinance 100225; accepting condemnation awards for Parcels 5 and 29 in connection therewith, and making an appropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund therefor.
